name: Georgette (Zebu, Becher)
description:
You play Georgette, a demon who wants to destroy everything by slamming it from height.

Georgette is a game with ASCII graphics made in a week for CNAM-ENJMIN Master's Degree in video game programming.

Credits :

Made by two french programmers :
@Becher and Simon Gigant (@Zebu).

You can find source code on Github.

Controls :

Move with [A and D]
Jump with [Space or W]
Slam in air with [S]
Exit game with [Escape]
